title: Rogue Trooper: Tales of Nu-Earth, Vol. 4
description: THE FINAL CLASSIC ROGUE COLLECTION As the Norts and Southers wage war on the battletorn world of Nu-Earth, the genetically-engineered soldier, Rogue trooper, continues his one-man mission to make survive the unending conflict about him. This volume completes the Rogue Trooper series, collecting the final adventures from the orginal character's run, including the most recent strips from 2000 AD.
author: John      Smith
